name: Light Warper
description:
<FLASHING LIGHTS WARNING>
This game contains quickly flashing lights and bright colors. Do not play if you have any experience with epilepsy or its symptoms.

Shoot through waves of enemies all while the game itself gets more and more unstable...

You control a small blue square that is tasked with clearing as many levels as possible. Each level, a set amount of enemies will be placed randomly. If you can defeat all the enemies, you will advance to the next level.

But, be careful!
The bar on the top indicates the game's Stability. As time goes on, the game will grow more unstable. Hitting the walls will increase the game's instability, but if you can manage to clear a level without missing a single shot, the game will become more stable.

If your health drops to 0, or if the game becomes too unstable, you will be destroyed.
How far can you go?

(And just for fun: the furthest  I've gotten  is Level 32. Good Luck!)
